com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.files

Class ASharedFile<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.files.ASharedFile<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of part data
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedBinaryFile, SharedTextFile

    public abstract class ASharedFile<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    SharedFile is client representation of file shared at network.

                   GroupClientThread client,
                   Encryptor encryptor,
                   java.net.InetAddress server)
        Parameters:
        name - Unique name of file
        client - Thread with socket, which can SharedFile use for CLIENT_FILE_SHARE_PART_REQUEST
        encryptor - object responsible for encrypting requests
        server - server ip

    • Method Detail

      • setPart

                             T content)
        Saves received data to temporary structure, before they are written to file
        Parameters:
        index - place of part
        content - part data

      • finished

        public void finished()
        Called from client thread when received SERVER_FILE_SHARE_FINISH

      • finishOrRequest

        protected abstract boolean finishOrRequest()
        In case some parts are missing, request server for resending them
        Returns:
        true, if all parts have been gathered

      • fillFile

        protected abstract void fillFile(java.io.File createdFile)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes received data into shared file
        Parameters:
        createdFile - file with name received from Server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isPartValid

        public abstract boolean isPartValid(T data,
                                    int checksum)
        Parameters:
        data - Data of received part
        checksum - control sum received from server
        Returns:
        true, if client calculated checksum is same as server checksum
